name: Practia
description:
We are the most prestigious technology services company in Latin America with offices in seven countries. Over the last 20 years our team of 1000 highly qualified professionals have successfully executed over 5000 projects.
We provide onsite and remote consulting services for off shore/ near shore customers, ranging from Quality Assurance factories, Software Development, Analytics (Big Data), all the way to the outsourcing of business processes in the backend and the front office (specialized service). Our Solutions Centre is a hub of expertise in world-class solutions integration and in managing the implementation of globally distributed teams.
